name: ScatterPaws
description:
It's been at least two minutes since Coots was fed, which in cat terms means... Coots is starving! Unfortunately, Ludwig is too busy streaming or something, so what better way to get their attention than wreaking havoc and destroying everything in sight! 

Guide kitty with laser pointer accuracy while trying to avoid getting distracted, all while slippy-sliding all over the house!

-----------------

Scatterpaws is our second ever gamejam game painstakingly coded , drawn and composed  from scratch over any free time we had during 10 days as a submission for Ludwig Jam 2023 (Theme: Coots/10 Minutes or Less)! We hope you love it as much as we do!

Programming: EvanMMO
Graphics/Level design: Riazey
Graphics: Osyris
Audio: Ragchomp
